chapter.title: Requirements for consumers
chapter.para: Applications built for RES must be able to understand the index assembled by Acropolis, as well as the source data it refers to. Practically, it means that they must be able to:

listitem.para: retrieve and process RDF from remote web servers;
interpret at least the “common metadata” vocabularies described in this book.

para.remark: This section will be expanded significantly in future editions.
